name: Qintil
slogan: Thousands of ways to learn.  One place to find, manage and share it all
description:
Qintil is a lifelong learning platform that's built for the way the world works today.  You'll almost certainly have more than one job in your lifetime, and quite possibly more than one career.  You might even work more than one job at once, or for a staffing agency, and you're more likely than ever to freelance or work for yourself.
​
We built Qintil so that you can find, share and manage everything that's essential for work - your learning, certificates, achievements and right to work docs - in one place.  You can share them, connect to more than one employer's learning at one time and when you move to a new job, contract or career you can take it all with you and continue to add to your lifelong record of learning.
​
This all helps employers too of course.  Now there's an easy to way to get a record of new hires' learning and documents and to deliver their own training from any source, manage right to work and training compliance with Learning Manager.

And we're building a network of Learning Partners, with dedicated tools to help professional training and education businesses deliver and sell their courses, and manage their clients.
​
Our mission is to help everyone benefit from the thousands of ways there are to learn and to have one place to find, manage and share it all.

jobs.title: Remote Customer Success Agent - Flexible Roles
jobs.description:
DESCRIPTION

Qintil is used by thousands of people and business to help them manage their professional learning. We're a technology startup based in London and with team members in the UK, Australia and Southeast Asia.

We're looking for a remote worker based in Australasia or Asia, to help our customers in the region, and to promote Qintil on social media and through events and partnerships.

The role is flexible and can work around you, and you'll have the support of your team members globally.

REQUIREMENTS

Working from a location in Australasia or Asia, you'll support customers and users in the region using online tools and occasionally providing telephone support, product demos and on-boarding.

Here's what you'll be doing:

Providing amazing customer support using Crisp chat and occasional telephone support

Demoing the product to new prospects in Australia and New Zealand

Providing on-boarding and success assistance to new customers

Talking about Qintil on social media and being an ambassador for the platform

Occasionally representing us at events and conferences

We want you to to do your best work and do what you enjoy, so if you think you'd be better at one thing but not at another, that's cool - just tell us where your strengths lie and we'll see if there is a good fit for both of us.

You'll need to respond to Crisp chats quickly, but you'll be able to manage the rest of your workload. 

BENEFITS

Other than Crisp chat cover, you'll get the flexibility to choose your hours and we'll give you full training on how to service our customers. You'll be part of a growing international team.

Flexible working hours and hourly pay + commission / bonus potential

We can contribute towards your membership of a local co-working space

Work with a fun, passionate and professional international team

jobs.title: Trainee Business Development Manager
jobs.description: Sales support for a company in a heavy growth stage. Reporting directly to one of the Co-Founders.
jobs.descriptionHtml: Sales support for a company in a heavy growth stage. Reporting directly to one of the Co-Founders.
skills: Hard working Go getter Team player

jobs.title: Sales and Customer Success Agent
jobs.description:
Qintil is hiring for the position of Sales and Customer Success Agent. 

The role includes: 

B2B sales and BD
Customer support 
On-boarding our customers
Lead generation
Ad-hoc administration

You will be working directly with one of the Founders of Qintil and the Head of Customer Success. 

The position is on a remote part-time basis and will develop into a full-time role if we find the right fit! 

You must be available to cover customer support for a set period Monday to Friday plus one full weekend per month.
